events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 28th, requesting to file a new auto accident claim.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under the Auto Accident cluster due to keywords related to car collision and vehicle damage.
An agent specialized in vehicle collision claims was assigned to handle this case to ensure efficient processing.
The customer was notified that their auto accident claim was officially acknowledged and is now under review.
Requested the customer submit accident report, vehicle repair estimate, and photos of the collision damage to proceed.
The customer successfully uploaded all requested documents including police report, damage photos, and repair quotations.
The investigation team began reviewing documentation and assessing the extent of damage to the vehicle involved in the accident.
Completion of investigation confirmed the collision was caused by third-party negligence with no fault on the insured driver.
A settlement amount covering vehicle repair costs was proposed and shared with the customer for approval.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling process so far.
The claim was officially approved by the underwriting team based on investigation findings and customer agreement.
Payment covering the vehicle repair expenses has been issued to the customer's bank account as per the approved settlement.
The auto accident claim file was closed following successful payment disbursal and confirmed satisfaction from the customer.
The case records for this vehicle collision claim were archived for future reference and auditing purposes.
